mapper.select: select rb_num, rb_title, m_name, rb_content, rb_file, rb_replycount, rb_readcount, rb_regdate from (select rownum rnum, rb_num, rb_title, m_name, rb_content, rb_file, rb_replycount, rb_readcount, rb_regdate from (select rb_num, rb_title, m_name, rb_content, rb_file, rb_replycount, rb_readcount, rb_regdate from ig_review order by rb_regdate desc )) where rnum between #{begin} and #{end}
mapper.update: update ig_review set rb_readcount = rb_readcount + 1 where rb_num = #{rb_num}
update ig_review set rb_replycount = rb_replycount + 1 where rb_num = #{rb_num}
mapper.select: select count(*) from ig_comment where rb_num = #{rb_num}
